UserComments.Comment: Charging station opened in November. Operates successfully.

AddressInfo.Title: EV Fast Charge Network Site at Camp Jordan
AddressInfo.AccessComments:
This site provides simultaneous charging for up to 4 vehicles (3 CCS & 1 CHAdeMO) at up to 240kW.
App is NOT required to charge. Start and follow your charging session in the ZEF Energy app or mobile web browser by scanning the QR code displayed on screen, or pay by credit card (then no session status)

Accessible Space
- There is a space marked with white pavers showing where drivers who need extra space to maneuver wheelchairs, walkers, or oversize vehicles may park to charge.
Plugs (2 Kinds)

GeneralComments:
Amenities at Charging Site
- Free EPB Gigabit speed WiFi on site (coming soon!)
- Grassy area to walk dogs, doggie waste bags & receptacle provided
- Trash, Recycling & Compost cans

Bathrooms are located in the restaurants listed below, in shops, at at the Campground Pavilion and Arena at Camp Jordan. Map of Camp Jordan available here: https://www.eastridgeparksandrec.com/page/show/2310367-camp-jordan

Amenities within walking distance
Restaurants (in order of closest to chargers)
- Chick-fil-A
- Starbucks
- Dairy Queen
- Jonathan's Grille
- Pizza Bros
- Dos Bros Fresh Mexican Grille
- Buddy's BBQ
- Twin Peaks

Other
- Emergency Room facility - Park Ridge Hospital, Camp Jordan
- Shopping at Bass Pro Shop

Camp Jordan:
- Picnic pavilion (subject to availability) on site.
- Stocked Fishing Pond - TN License Required
- 2 mile paved walking trail
- 18 Hole Disc Golf Course
- South & West Chickamauga Creek Access for Canoeing and Kayaking
- Open Green Space 100 + Acres
- Nature Trail
- Dog Friendly (Leash)
- Pavilion / Restroom / Showers

Check East Ridge's EventBrite to find up to date event & festival information: https://www.eventbrite.com/d/tn--east-ridge/events/
